---
title: "Sheet-pan gnocchi w/ roasted tomatoes"
categories: Gnocchi
---

# Ingredients
- 500g gnocchi
- 500g cherry tomatoes
- 3 cups chopped kale
- 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 1/2 teaspoon Greek or Italian seasoning
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
- 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1 pound of mild Italian sausage links, squeezed out of the casing and rolled into little meatballs
- 4oz burrata ball
- 1/4 cup grated Parm

# Instructions
## 1
- Preheat oven to 425F

## 2
- On a rimmed sheet pan toss everything but the cheeses
- Roast for 20 to 25 minutes until the tomatoes are bursting and the kale is crispy on the edges

## 3
- Add the cheeses and toss, bursting the tomatoes with your spoon to create a sauce

## 4
- When everything is combined and creamy, serve with more parm on top!
